text: Marc Ferro (24 December 1924 – 21 April 2021) was a French historian. He was Director of Studies in Social Sciences at the École des hautes études en sciences sociales. He was a co-director of the French review Annales and co- editor of the Journal of Contemporary History. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2009. Ferro died in Saint-Germain-en-Laye in April 2021 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French historians Category:Writers from Paris Category:Members of Academia Europaea
